overview: Akira Shell:  Daddy I'm sorry you had to see me like this but after you kicked me out I had no choice but to try and make money. I'm not sure how you found out. I was going to try this but you're my first ride. Mmmm let me suck your cock on the way home, that feels so good doesn't it?
tagline: There's Nothing Like The Look Of Love In A Girl's Eyes For Her Daddy.
title: Daddy's POV Pleasures
